author: parithosh
content:
Are any client teams still using `goerli-shadow-fork-2` or `goerli-shadow-fork-1` for active debugging? (`fork-1` is non-finalizing, `fork-2` has an even client split and is finalizing). 

We have a stable, running, finalizing `goerli-shadow-fork-3` (with mainnet client split) that everyone can still use for testing and it will stay around for a bit.
 
React with a ğŸš€ if you want them to stick around another week. âŒ if you are okay with it to be terminated on thursday (7th april).
